description.zh-cn: 1962年在中国共产党内部发生的一场政治迫害事件，小说《刘志丹》被定性为反党小说，导致包括习仲勋在内的大量干部被迫害，被认为是“文化大革命”的先声。
description.en: A political persecution incident within the Communist Party of China in 1962, where the novel 'Liu Zhidan' was labeled an anti-Party novel, leading to the persecution of numerous officials including Xi Zhongxun. It is considered a precursor to the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 一部由李建彤创作的旨在纪念革命家刘志丹的小说。该小说在1962年引发了“反党小说《刘志丹》案”，并在经历多次禁与不禁后，于2009年重新出版。
description.en: A novel written by Li Jiantong to commemorate the revolutionary Liu Zhidan. The novel triggered the 'Anti-Party Novel Liu Zhidan Case' in 1962, and after being banned and unbanned multiple times, was republished in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，小说《刘志丹》的作者，刘景范的妻子。因创作该小说而在“反党小说《刘志丹》案”中受到长期迫害。
description.en: Chinese writer, author of the novel 'Liu Zhidan', and wife of Liu Jingfan. She was persecuted for a long time during the 'Anti-Party Novel Liu Zhidan Case' for writing the novel.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前高层领导人，在党内以“整人专家”著称。“反党小说《刘志丹》案”的主要策划者和推动者。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China, known within the party as an expert in purging people. He was the main planner and promoter of the 'Anti-Party Novel Liu Zhidan Case'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。因审阅小说《刘志丹》手稿并提出修改意见，而在1962年被打成“习贾刘反党集团”核心成员，遭受长期审查、关押和迫害。
description.en: One of the former main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. For reviewing the manuscript of the novel 'Liu Zhidan' and providing suggestions, he was labeled a core member of the 'Xi-Jia-Liu Anti-Party Clique' in 1962 and subjected to long-term investigation, detention, and persecution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。他在中共八届十中全会上就小说《刘志丹》问题发表的言论，为该案的升级和扩大化提供了支持。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. His remarks on the novel 'Liu Zhidan' at the Tenth Plenary Session of the Eighth Central Committee of the CCP provided support for the escalation and expansion of the case.

death_place.en: Sanjiao Town, Zhongyang County, Shanxi Province

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，陕甘边革命根据地的主要创建者之一。小说《刘志丹》即是为纪念他而创作。
description.en: A high-ranking commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and one of the main founders of the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Revolutionary Base. The novel 'Liu Zhidan' was written in his memory.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘志丹之弟，李建彤的丈夫。因小说《刘志丹》案与习仲勋、贾拓夫一同被打成“习贾刘反党集团”。
description.en: Chinese political figure, younger brother of Liu Zhidan and husband of Li Jiantong. He was labeled as part of the 'Xi-Jia-Liu Anti-Party Clique' along with Xi Zhongxun and Jia Tuofu in the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级干部。因对小说《刘志丹》提出修改意见，被打成“习贾刘反党集团”成员，后被迫害致死。
description.en: A senior cadre of the Communist Party of China. He was labeled a member of the 'Xi-Jia-Liu Anti-Party Clique' for offering suggestions on the novel 'Liu Zhidan' and was later persecuted to death.

description.zh-cn: 中国的出版社。该社奉中宣部指示，邀请李建彤创作小说《刘志丹》，并计划出版。在案件平反后，于1979年正式出版了该书。
description.en: A publishing house in China. Following instructions from the Central Propaganda Department, it invited Li Jiantong to write the novel 'Liu Zhidan' and planned its publication. After the case was rehabilitated, it officially published the book in 1979.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的职能部门。该部门指示工人出版社创作一部关于刘志丹的小说。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the CCP responsible for ideological work. It instructed the Workers' Publishing House to create a novel about Liu Zhidan.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共云南省委第一书记。他因不同意小说《刘志丹》出版，并向康生报告，成为引发此案的关键人物之一。
description.en: Then First Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Committee. He became one of the key figures in triggering the case by disagreeing with the publication of the novel 'Liu Zhidan' and reporting it to Kang Sheng.

description.zh-cn: 时任中宣部副部长。他曾审阅并同意出版小说《刘志丹》，后因此案在文革期间被捕入狱。
description.en: Then Deputy Minister of the Central Propaganda Department. He reviewed and approved the publication of the novel 'Liu Zhidan', and was later imprisoned during the Cultural Revolution because of this case.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国前领导人之一，因“高岗饶漱石事件”被打为反党集团首领。小说《刘志丹》被指控为高岗翻案是其主要罪名之一。
description.en: A former leader of the CCP and PRC, labeled the leader of an anti-Party clique in the 'Gao Gang-Rao Shushi Incident'. One of the main accusations against the novel 'Liu Zhidan' was that it was an attempt to reverse the verdict on Gao Gang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场大规模政治运动。在此期间，“反党小说《刘志丹》案”的受害者遭到更残酷的迫害。
description.en: A large-scale political movement in the People's Republic of China. During this period, the victims of the 'Anti-Party Novel Liu Zhidan Case' were subjected to more brutal persecution.

en: Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管党组织建设和干部工作的职能部门。该部门于1979年递交报告，为小说《刘志丹》案平反。
description.en: The functional department of the CCP Central Committee responsible for party organization and cadre work. In 1979, this department submitted a report to rehabilitate the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。该机构于1979年正式为《刘志丹》案平反，但在1986年又决定停止该书发行。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China. It officially rehabilitated the 'Liu Zhidan' case in 1979, but decided to halt the book's distribution again in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记。1986年，他批示认为党史题材作品不应虚构重大史实，导致小说《刘志丹》再次被停止发行。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. In 1986, his instruction that works on Party history should not fictionalize major historical facts led to the novel 'Liu Zhidan' being withdrawn from distribution again.

description.zh-cn: 中国的出版社。该社于2009年重新出版了小说《刘志丹》。
description.en: A publishing house in China. It republished the novel 'Liu Zhidan' in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 由刘志丹等人于1920年代创建的革命根据地，后成为中共中央和工农红军长征的终点。
description.en: A revolutionary base created by Liu Zhidan and others in the 1920s, which later became the destination of the Long March for the CCP Central Committee and the Red Army.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年间领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces led by the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军进行的一次大规模军事转移，其终点是陕甘边革命根据地。
description.en: A large-scale military retreat undertaken by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, which ended at the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府属下的国家军队。在1936年的一次战斗中，刘志丹被其部队阻击身亡。
description.en: The national army under the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China. In a battle in 1936, Liu Zhidan was killed by its troops.

description.zh-cn: 在“反党小说《刘志丹》案”中，由康生等人捏造的针对习仲勋、贾拓夫、刘景范的“反党集团”罪名。
description.en: A fabricated 'anti-Party clique' charge against Xi Zhongxun, Jia Tuofu, and Liu Jingfan, concocted by Kang Sheng and others during the 'Anti-Party Novel Liu Zhidan Case'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，由康生等人将“习马刘反党集团”与“彭德怀反党集团”合并定性的罪名，导致大量西北干部受迫害。
description.en: A charge fabricated during the Cultural Revolution by Kang Sheng and others, merging the 'Xi-Ma-Liu Anti-Party Clique' and the 'Peng Dehuai Anti-Party Clique', which led to the persecution of a large number of officials from the Northwest.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管的报纸，曾在1962年连载小说《刘志丹》。
description.en: A newspaper supervised by the Central Committee of the CCP, which serialized the novel 'Liu Zhidan' in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会主办的报纸，曾在1962年连载小说《刘志丹》。
description.en: The official newspaper of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions, which serialized the novel 'Liu Zhidan' in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会主办的报纸，曾在1962年连载小说《刘志丹》。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China, which serialized the novel 'Liu Zhidan' in 1962.

zh-cn: 中共第八届中央委员会第十次全体会议
en: Tenth Plenary Session of the Eighth Central Committee of the CCP

description.zh-cn: 1962年9月在北京召开的中国共产党中央委员会会议。在此次会议上，毛泽东就《刘志丹》小说问题发表讲话，康生将此案定性为“利用小说反党”，导致事态严重升级。
description.en: A meeting of the CCP Central Committee held in Beijing in September 1962. At this meeting, Mao Zedong spoke on the issue of the novel 'Liu Zhidan', and Kang Sheng characterized the case as 'using a novel to oppose the Party', leading to a severe escalation of the situation.

description.zh-cn: 李建彤是小说《刘志丹》的作者，于1958年开始创作，1962年完成第五稿。
description.en: Li Jiantong is the author of the novel 'Liu Zhidan', starting its creation in 1958 and completing the fifth draft in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 工人出版社于1954年奉命组织小说《刘志丹》的创作，并于1979年正式出版该书。
description.en: In 1954, the Workers' Publishing House was ordered to organize the creation of the novel 'Liu Zhidan', and officially published the book in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央宣传部指示工人出版社创作一本歌颂刘志丹的小说。
description.en: The Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee instructed the Workers' Publishing House to create a novel praising Liu Zhidan.

description.zh-cn: 李建彤是刘景范的妻子。
description.en: Li Jiantong is the wife of Liu Jingfan.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范是刘志丹的弟弟。
description.en: Liu Jingfan is the younger brother of Liu Zhidan.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋应邀审阅了小说稿，并提出了要把小说写成三个“缩影”的修改意见。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun was invited to review the manuscript and suggested that the novel should be written as three 'epitomes'.

description.zh-cn: 贾拓夫对小说《刘志丹》提出了修改意见。
description.en: Jia Tuofu provided suggestions for revising the novel 'Liu Zhidan'.

description.zh-cn: 时任中宣部副部长的周扬审阅小说后认为没有问题，表示可以出版。
description.en: Zhou Yang, then Deputy Minister of the Central Propaganda Department, reviewed the novel, found no issues, and approved its publication.

description.zh-cn: 阎红彦写信给李建彤，以小说涉及需要中央决定的历史问题为由，不同意小说出版。
description.en: Yan Hongyan wrote to Li Jiantong, disagreeing with the novel's publication on the grounds that it involved historical issues that needed to be decided by the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 阎红彦就小说《刘志丹》的问题向康生作了报告，促使康生介入此事。
description.en: Yan Hongyan reported the issue of the novel 'Liu Zhidan' to Kang Sheng, prompting Kang Sheng's intervention.

description.zh-cn: 康生接到报告后，立即下令报刊不准再连载《刘志丹》，并将其定性为反党小说。
description.en: After receiving the report, Kang Sheng immediately ordered newspapers to stop serializing 'Liu Zhidan' and labeled it as an anti-Party novel.

description.zh-cn: 康生是“反党小说《刘志丹》案”的主要策划者，他在中共八届十中全会上提出“利用小说进行反党，是一大发明”，推动了案件的形成和升级。
description.en: Kang Sheng was the main instigator of the 'Anti-Party Novel Liu Zhidan Case'. At the Tenth Plenary Session of the Eighth CCP Central Committee, he proposed that 'using novels to carry out anti-Party activities is a great invention', which promoted the formation and escalation of the case.

description.zh-cn: 在中共八届十中全会上，毛泽东念了康生递上的“利用小说进行反党，是一大发明”的纸条并加以评论，为该案的成立提供了最高层的支持。
description.en: At the Tenth Plenary Session of the Eighth CCP Central Committee, Mao Zedong read and commented on a note from Kang Sheng stating 'using novels to carry out anti-Party activities is a great invention', providing top-level support for the case.

description.zh-cn: 因小说《刘志丹》案，习仲勋被打成“习贾刘反党集团”核心，被撤销一切职务，并遭受了长达16年的审查、关押和迫害。
description.en: Due to the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case, Xi Zhongxun was labeled the core of the 'Xi-Jia-Liu Anti-Party Clique', removed from all his posts, and subjected to 16 years of investigation, detention, and persecution.

description.zh-cn: 贾拓夫因该案被打成反党集团成员，被下放，并在文革期间被迫害致死。
description.en: Jia Tuofu was labeled a member of an anti-Party clique because of this case, was demoted, and was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范因该案被打成反党集团成员并受到迫害，直至1974年才获释。
description.en: Liu Jingfan was labeled a member of an anti-Party clique and persecuted because of this case, and was not released until 1974.

description.zh-cn: 作为小说作者，李建彤自1962年起被关押，1970年被开除党籍并下放劳改。
description.en: As the author of the novel, Li Jiantong was imprisoned from 1962, expelled from the Party in 1970, and sent to labor reform.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命的开始使得《刘志丹》案的受害者遭到更严酷的迫害，案件进一步升级为“西北反党集团”。
description.en: The beginning of the Cultural Revolution led to more severe persecution of the victims of the 'Liu Zhidan' case, which was further escalated into the 'Northwest Anti-Party Group'.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央组织部于1979年向中央递交报告，建议为小说《刘志丹》案平反。
description.en: In 1979, the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee submitted a report to the Central Committee, recommending the rehabilitation of the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共中央于1979年8月下发文件，为小说《刘志丹》一案彻底平反。
description.en: In August 1979, the CCP Central Committee issued a document to completely rehabilitate the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记的胡耀邦作出批示，认为党史题材作品不应虚构重大史实，导致该书被停止发行。
description.en: Hu Yaobang, then General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, issued an instruction that works on Party history should not fictionalize major historical facts, which led to the halt of the book's distribution.

description.zh-cn: 江西教育出版社于2009年重新出版了小说《刘志丹》。
description.en: Jiangxi Education Press republished the novel 'Liu Zhidan' in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 刘志丹是陕甘边革命根据地的主要创建者之一。
description.en: Liu Zhidan was one of the main founders of the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 陕甘边革命根据地成为中央红军长征的终点，即“西北救中央”。
description.en: The Shaanxi-Gansu Border Revolutionary Base became the destination of the Long March for the Central Red Army, known as 'the Northwest saving the Central'.

description.zh-cn: 1936年，刘志丹在山西中阳县三交镇的战斗中被国民政府军队阻击身亡。
description.en: In 1936, Liu Zhidan was killed by the troops of the Nationalist Government during a battle in Sanjiao Town, Zhongyang County, Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 康生策划将习仲勋、贾拓夫、刘景范打成“习贾刘”反党集团。
description.en: Kang Sheng planned to label Xi Zhongxun, Jia Tuofu, and Liu Jingfan as the 'Xi-Jia-Liu' anti-Party clique.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，《刘志丹》案升级，与彭德怀反党集团合并，形成了“西北反党集团”。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the 'Liu Zhidan' case escalated and was merged with the Peng Dehuai anti-Party clique to form the 'Northwest Anti-Party Group'.

description.zh-cn: 《光明日报》于1962年开始连载小说《刘志丹》。
description.en: Guangming Daily began serializing the novel 'Liu Zhidan' in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 《工人日报》于1962年开始连载小说《刘志丹》。
description.en: Workers' Daily began serializing the novel 'Liu Zhidan' in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 《中国青年报》于1962年开始连载小说《刘志丹》。
description.en: China Youth Daily began serializing the novel 'Liu Zhidan' in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 在此次会议上，《刘志丹》小说案被正式提出并定性，决定成立专案委员会进行审查，导致事件严重升级。
description.en: At this plenum, the 'Liu Zhidan' novel case was formally raised and characterized, and it was decided to establish a special committee for investigation, leading to a serious escalation of the event.
